alert.note: Alert for Frazier Mountain Communities; Piute Walker Basin; Tehachapi (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 13 at 10:40PM PST until December 15 at 12:00AM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TUESDAY TO MIDNIGHT PST TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 feet above 6,500 feet. For Tehachapi Pass including the town of Tehachapi, total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Piute Walker Basin, Tehachapi and Frazier Mountain Communities Counties. * WHEN...From 4 AM Tuesday to Midnight PST Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow levels will fall to 3,500 feet by late Tuesday morning, with snow impacting Tehachapi Pass by Tuesday afternoon.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Frazier Mountain Communities; Piute Walker Basin; Tehachapi
